General.Name: Fortior Technology (Shenzhen) Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Fortior Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. provides driver and control IC chips for various motor systems in Asian, North American, and European markets. Its products include three phase ASIC series, single phase ASIC series, driver IC Series, MOSFET series, MCU series, and IPM series. Its chips are used in various fields covering industrial equipment, motion control, power tools, garden tools, home appliances, medical, consumer electronics, AI and robotics, IT and communications, and other driver control fields. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
